version_description:
Thank you for your feedback and reporting bugs. You spoke and we listened! This version has your top three features! Please keep your feedback coming!

TOP FEATURES
-------------------------------------

- Resorting! Press and hold on any Timerlist or individual timer to move it up or down.
- Repeat Timerlists - Now you can repeat any timerlist. Just tap on the "Rounds" button on any timerlist to set.
- Sharing - Share your favorite timerlists with your friends. Importing shared timerlists is as easy as tapping on the item in Mail on your iphone and opening the timerlist.
- Quick Set - Press and hold on "Rounds" or any timer value, then drag up and down to quickly set the value. 

OTHER FEATURES
-------------------------------------

- New overview bar on Detail view so you can get an idea of your overall progress. Tap on the bar to go to the current running segment.
- Adjusted the gain on tones to make them less harsh.
- Tones get played at the start and end of the timerlist.
- Lots of palette and layout tweaks.
- Tons of bugfixes!
- More performance and stability fixes.
- Updated fonts

- Fixed issues with tones not playing
- Fixed layout issue on tap to add button

- Fixed issues with tones not playing
- Fixed layout issue on tap to add button
